mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_TBL(MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_DATE, MEMBER_STATUS, MEMBER_TYPE) VALUES(SEQ_MEMBERNO.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberAddr}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER_TBL WHERE MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{memberNickname}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER_TBL WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}
